task.title: Configuring MME support for 3GPP standard update release 16 for March/June/Sept/Dec 2020 and March 2021 - phase 2
task.shortdesc: Use global parameter monitoringEventsDeletionByUla to enable this feature.

step.cmd: Change the value of backoff timers.

p.codeph: cmm command cmm timer modify --timerName t3346NbIotOdbRejectMaximum --timerValue 900
cmm command cmm timer modify --timerName t3346NbIotOdbRejectMinimum --timerValue 600
